typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Certification_ID as double,
		{Validation Flag} as double,
		{Certification Type} as string,
		{Certification Number} as string,
		{Next Audit Date} as string,
		{Certifying Body} as string,
		{Certification Date} as date,
		{Certification End Date} as date,
		{Certified Entity} as string,
		{Number of Open Minor CARS} as string,
		{Number of Open Major CARS} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceDataTab
SourceDataTab derive(CertificationTypeValidateMsg = iif(length(trim({Certification Type})) > 0, "", "Certification Type"),
		CertificationEndDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull({Certification End Date}), "", "Certification End Date")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',CertificationTypeValidateMsg,CertificationEndDateValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Certification_ID,
		{Validation Flag},
		{Certification Type},
		{Certification Number},
		{Next Audit Date},
		{Certifying Body},
		{Certification Date},
		{Certification End Date},
		{Certified Entity},
		{Number of Open Minor CARS},
		{Number of Open Major CARS}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutput
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concatWS("/", CertificationTypeValidateMsg, CertificationEndDateValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
SelectedColumnsOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("-", $WorkbookName, $TabName))],
	mapColumn(
		Certification_ID,
		Validation_Flag = {Validation Flag},
		Certification_Type = {Certification Type},
		Certification_Number = {Certification Number},
		Next_Audit_Date = {Next Audit Date},
		Certifying_Body = {Certifying Body},
		Certification_Date = {Certification Date},
		Certification_End_Date = {Certification End Date},
		Certified_Entity = {Certified Entity},
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS = {Number of Open Minor CARS},
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS = {Number of Open Major CARS}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquet
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['testCertificationsError,csv'],
	mapColumn(
		Certification_ID,
		{Validation Flag},
		{Certification Type},
		{Certification Number},
		{Next Audit Date},
		{Certifying Body},
		{Certification Date},
		{Certification End Date},
		{Certified Entity},
		{Number of Open Minor CARS},
		{Number of Open Major CARS},
		CertificationTypeValidateMsg,
		CertificationEndDateValidateMsg,
		ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
